title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Michael and Jeff
description:
Michael and Jeff discuss their shared admiration of C.S. Lewis, the image of God in people, and the immense weight of every human thought and action.

Join the ConverZation.  Talk to PVK Randos and their ilk here:
https://discord.gg/zdjzsFu

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsD...
